Package system.net.sockets

Class Socket

java.lang.Object
org.mases.jcobridge.netreflection.NetObject
system.net.sockets.Socket
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable, IJCOBridgeReflected
public class Socket
extends NetObject
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
The base .NET class managing System.Net.Sockets.Socket, System.Net.Sockets, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a. Extends NetObject.

See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Net.Sockets.Socket
